programme.title: Ambassador Glaspie's interventions
programme.short_synopsis: Did April Glaspie's conversations with Saddam Hussein aid the 1991 Persian Gulf War?
programme.medium_synopsis: April Glaspie, American Ambassador to Iraq, is called to explain her pre-war conversations with Saddam Hussein. Could her words have aided the start of the 1990/1 Persian Gulf War?

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
